attributes.action: Lower The Voting Age To 16 for the next general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i am an underage voter and at school we are taught citizenship which tells us about parliament, current affairs and voting.
i believe that with the knowledge about voting and politics at 14, there is little cause not to lower the voting age to 16.
who is with me?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
